workProjects.name: AGL
workProjects.description: Working within the Identity Management Team as a Digital Developer. Implemented user ability to share personal data with third parties in line with the new Consumer Data Rights Legislation. Upgraded from the Custom to Universal Login in AGL's Auth0 integration to provide a more seamless and modern login experience for users.

workProjects.name: Linktree
workProjects.description: Developed and launched Linktree's new pricing and packaging structure and contributed to both the frontend and backend.

workProjects.name: ANZ
workProjects.description: Worked on the initial concept and development of a marketplace to be integrated into the new ANZ Plus App.

workProjects.name: Propel
workProjects.description: Worked at Propel as a Full Stack Developer and consultant to ANZ, Linktree and AGL.

personalProjects.name: Geonbae
personalProjects.description: From initial concept - to fitout in a new commercial building - to ongoing management and marketing - Geonbae was a personal experiment to test whether conviction and hardwork could turn an idea into a profitable business. The result speaks for itself.
personalProjects.media-alt: Geonbae Official Opening by Local Member Chris Chrewther

personalProjects.name: Port Grocer
personalProjects.description: The local community of Port Kembla asked for a community led, zero waste supermarket to be established in the township. A run down warehouse was obtained and transformed into a welcoming community meeting place where locals could purchase all their grocery staples without the usual associated waste.
personalProjects.languages: Our Community Project - Port Kembla, NSW
personalProjects.mediaAlt: Port Grocer WIN TV news segment

personalProjects.name: Loch & Key
personalProjects.description: Revamped an old Victorian building and created a welcoming and intimate dining experience in the scenic village of Loch in South Gippsland.

personalProjects.name: Camino de Santiago
personalProjects.description: Trekked 800km from St Jean Pied de Port, France to Santiago, Spain in 32 days.
